title: Summer Love
lyrics:
We are cool for this summer
When I'm like
‘Boy, I got your body
On my mind'
You make my heart beat faster

I'll be your sweet disaster

Deep in my bones



I want your love, love, love

Take off your clothes, clothes, clothes

I want your love, love, love

You drink my rose, rose, rose

I want your love



Summer, summer, summer

Summer, summer, summer



We are cool for this summer

When I'm like

‘Boy, I got your body

On my mind'



You make my heart beat faster

I'll be your sweet disaster

Deep in my bones



I want your love, love, love

Take off your clothes, clothes, clothes

I want your love, love, love

You drink my rose, rose, rose

I want your love



Summer, summer, summer

Summer, summer, summer
